exp_description: Discover my detailed career history, from designing AI-powered microservices to optimizing high-scale ERP platforms and leading frontend architecture.
exp_page_subtitle: A detailed overview of my career journey, technical leadership, and engineering achievements.
exp_progziel_desc_1: Design and maintain scalable backend services using Node.js, TypeScript, Nestjs, Expressjs, Flask, MongoDB, Prisma and PostgreSQL.
exp_progziel_desc_2: Led development of an AI-powered image similarity search system using ResNet-18, CLIP, and FAISS, implementing data scraping, embedding generation, and high-speed vector retrieval.
exp_progziel_desc_3: Built a production-grade AI chatbot using RAG architecture with OpenAI, Gemini, Pinecone, and LangChain, including local model fallback for service reliability.
exp_progziel_desc_4: Implemented geospatial intelligence features including geofencing, speed monitoring, curfew enforcement, and real-time tracking using Haversine formula and Ray Casting algorithms.
exp_progziel_desc_5: Designed and enforced RBAC and fine-grained permission systems across distributed services.
exp_progziel_desc_6: Integrated microservices using Kafka and deployed containerized applications with Docker and Docker Compose.
exp_progziel_desc_7: Designed and implemented real-time communication architecture using WebSockets, enabling live tracking, event broadcasting, and instant status synchronization across clients.
exp_progziel_desc_8: Optimized database queries and ensured transactional consistency in high-critical business operations.
exp_progziel_desc_9: Collaborated with frontend engineers, designers, and stakeholders in agile sprints to align backend systems with product requirements.
exp_solar_desc_1: Designed and developed a custom ERP platform using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL.
exp_solar_desc_2: Implemented inventory management, reporting dashboards, and workflow automation modules, improving operational efficiency by 60%.
exp_solar_desc_3: Built secure REST APIs with RBAC-based access control.
exp_solar_desc_4: Worked closely with business teams to translate operational requirements into scalable technical solutions.
exp_rawts_desc_1: Developed high-performance, SEO-optimized web applications using React and Gatsby.
exp_rawts_desc_2: Reduced page load times by 50% through performance optimization techniques.
blog_1_title: Harnessing AI for Enhanced User Experience
blog_1_excerpt: Explore how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing user interfaces, personalization, and customer engagement across digital platforms.
blog_1_content_1: Artificial intelligence is no longer a futuristic concept—it's a practical tool that can transform the way users interact with digital products. By integrating AI-driven insights, companies can create more intuitive and personalized user experiences.
blog_1_heading_1: The Role of Machine Learning in UX
blog_1_content_2: Machine learning algorithms analyze vast amounts of data to identify patterns, enabling platforms to predict user behavior and tailor experiences accordingly.
blog_1_image_caption: Leveraging machine learning to optimize user interactions.
blog_1_quote: Integrating AI into user experience design is the key to unlocking truly personalized digital journeys.
blog_1_content_3: By combining data science with user-centered design, businesses can achieve significant improvements in engagement and satisfaction.
blog_2_title: Deep Learning: From Theory to Practice
blog_2_excerpt: An in-depth guide to understanding deep learning principles and how to implement them effectively in real-world applications.
blog_2_content_1: Deep learning has transformed industries by enabling computers to learn from vast amounts of data. This post covers the fundamentals of deep learning and provides practical examples for implementation.
blog_2_content_2: Neural networks form the backbone of deep learning. They consist of layers of interconnected nodes that process input data and extract features progressively.
blog_2_image_caption: A visual representation of a deep neural network.
blog_2_quote: Deep learning bridges the gap between theoretical research and practical, scalable solutions.
blog_2_content_3: The integration of deep learning into your projects can drive innovation and provide a competitive edge in today's data-driven market.
blog_3_title: Revolutionizing the Web with the MERN Stack
blog_3_excerpt: Discover how the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) empowers developers to build dynamic and scalable web applications.
blog_3_content_1: The MERN stack is a powerful combination of technologies that allows developers to build full-stack applications using a single language—JavaScript. In this post, we explore the benefits of using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js together.
blog_3_content_2: The MERN stack offers a unified language across both the client and server sides, simplifying development and improving code maintainability.
blog_3_image_caption: A diagram showcasing the MERN stack components.
blog_3_quote: The MERN stack is not just a set of technologies; it's a complete ecosystem that drives modern web innovation.
blog_3_content_3: Leveraging the MERN stack can significantly accelerate development cycles and deliver high-performance applications.
blog_author_bio_ai: Tech Enthusiast and AI Strategist with a passion for innovation
blog_author_bio_fullstack: Full-Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies
blog_4_title: Claude Opus 4.6 vs OpenAI 5.2: The Ultimate AI Showdown
blog_4_excerpt: An in-depth, fact-based comparison of the latest flagship models from Anthropic and OpenAI. Which model reigns supreme in reasoning, coding, and production?
blog_4_content_1: The landscape of generative AI has experienced an unprecedented leap in late 2025 and 2026. The two dominant forces in the industry, Anthropic and OpenAI, have released their highly anticipated flagship models: Claude Opus 4.6 and OpenAI 5.2. As developers and enterprises scramble to integrate the best model into their production workflows, choosing the right AI has never been more critical.
blog_4_content_2: OpenAI 5.2 brings blazing fast generation speeds and a significantly improved multimodal reasoning system, excelling at real-time video and audio analysis. However, Anthropic's Claude Opus 4.6 continues to dominate complex cognitive tasks. With a near-perfect recall on its massive 500K context window and superior logical reasoning, Claude Opus 4.6 remains the undisputed leader in software architecture design, complex multi-file refactoring, and following deep contextual guardrails.
blog_4_image_caption: Comparing the architectures and output benchmarks of the two leading LLMs in 2026.
blog_4_quote: While OpenAI 5.2 excels at raw multimodal speed, Claude Opus 4.6 remains the undisputed king of nuanced, long-context cognitive logic and software engineering.
blog_4_content_3: For latency-sensitive applications requiring robust multimodal input, OpenAI 5.2 is an excellent choice. But for rigorous coding, deep research, and tasks demanding zero hallucination across dense documentation, Claude Opus 4.6 is the clear production-grade winner for 2026.
